select count(*) from board

where btitle like '%'|| #{searchW}||'%' or bcontent like '%' || #{searchW} || '%'

select * from board where bno =(
select prev_bno from
(select bno,lead(bno,1,-1) over(order by bgroup desc,bstep asc) as prev_bno from board) b where bno=#{bno})

select * from board where bno =(
select next_bno from (select bno,lag(bno,1,-1) over(order by bgroup desc,bstep asc) as next_bno from board) b where bno=#{bno})
mapper.update: update board set bhit=bhit+1 where bno=#{bno}

update board set bstep=bstep+1 where bgroup=#{bgroup} and bstep > #{bstep}
